name: IP Problem
description: Intellectual and/or industrial property issue: logo, design, brand, etc can not be used in an illustration.

name: Lacks unity of sense
description: Illustration doesn't convey a clear message across (controls shouldn't change the message)

name: Low design quality
description: Design quality below expectations: the lack of details for the illustrations makes it difficult to differentiate from icons.

name: Low commercial value
description: No or little use in business context.

name: Inadequate indexation
description: No appropriate descriptive/concept tags, spamdexing, or wrong category.

name: Similar to existing content
description: Too many similar illustrations: one or more similar illustration or design styles have already been submitted.

name: Doubts about originality
description: Doubts about the artwork origin: illustration seems generic or has been spotted somewhere else.

name: Inadequate design style
description: Design style not adaquate: design seems too different from other illustrations from the series

name: No/bad use of theme
description: No theme or badly implemented: themes color's badly selected or missing themes.

name: Bad variable integration
description: Number of variables not appropriate or badly implemented (not in line with the content)

name: SVG code not compliant
description: SVG code is not compliant: size is too big, too complex / too many elements in the vector file, functions not supported by SVG.

name: Vector format issue
description: Integration of rasterized elements or bitmaps.
